keypair
Class EncodeDecode

java.lang.Object
  keypair.EncodeDecode

public class EncodeDecode
extends java.lang.Object

Encode/decode public/private keys. Used when keys are saved to a file/loaded from a file.

Since:
1.2.2009
Author:
Petri Tuononen
